Title: Max Scherzer Secures First Win in Nearly a Year as Blue Jays Edge A’s 7-6 ⚾
Description: Max Scherzer's first win in nearly a year highlights a thrilling game where he struck out 8 batters over 6 innings, allowing just 5 hits. The Blue Jays’ 6 unearned runs in the fifth inning fueled their 7-6 victory, marking their 13th win in 15 games and Scherzer’s first Toronto win since 2015. Vladimir Guerrero Jr. reached 1,000 career hits during the game. Discover what’s next for these dynamic teams!
